Subject: Testing Umbra at the Danish Netarchive
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=278860915
From: Colin Rosenthal <csr@...>

Hi Everybody,

As part of Innovation Week at the State and University Library, and 
following on from discussions at the IIPC Technical Workshop in London 
in January, I have spent a few days experiment with IA Umbra and 
Heritrix. I've written a wiki page describing our experiences, including 
detailed installation and configuration instructions, as well as some 
rather more limited discussion of the actual results we were able to 
obtain using Umbra. I hope the page will be a useful resource to anybody 
else thinking about adding Umbra-integration to their Heritrix 3 
workflows, and that it might even help to stimulate some Umbra 
user-community action!

https://sbforge.org/display/NAS/Experience+With+IA+Umbra

Let me know what you think.

Colin Rosenthal
IT Developer
State and University Library, Aarhus
